title: The Hillman Group 2948 8 x 1-1/2-Inch Stainless Steel Oval Head Phillips Sheet Metal Screw, 15-Pack
features: Designed for joining thin pieces of metal to wood, fiberglass, or metal
Full assortment includes Phillips-drive oval-head screw variants
Included parts range #6 to #12 in screw size
Stainless steel finish for best-in-class corrosion resistance
description: These sheet metal screws, or tapping screws, are highly versatile and are used to attached metal, wood, fiberglass, and plastic. The sharp threads draw material together and ensure a secure hold. Sheet metal screws are fully threaded with a sharp point.

These sheet metal screws, or tapping screws, are highly versatile and are used to attached metal, wood, fiberglass, and plastic. The sharp threads draw material together and ensure a secure hold. Sheet metal screws are fully threaded with a sharp point.
